answers.author: Derek Johnson
answers.text:
Alyssa, 
You are not the first person to ask this question. There was a rather lively and informative discussion on this very topic on the Knowledge Network 5 months ago.  
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/questions/question/20198 
The substance of the original question asked is a little different from yours, but I think you'll find the ensuing dialogue between different city managers to be instructive.  
Furthermore, the KN has an entire topic on Council-Manager relations, where you can find relevant documents, read interesting articles and network with other local government professionals who may be able to help you further.  
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/topics/kn/Topic/65/CouncilManager_Relations#Tab=Documents 
For Example, I've attached to this response a report on finding respectable common ground between city managers and local elected officials.  
Hope this helps. 
Derek Johnson
